casebody.data:
Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Hess.

[Cite as Disciplinary Counsel v. Hess (1991), 61 Ohio St.3d 101.]

(No. 91-419 Submitted April 9, 1991 Decided July 10, 1991.) *102J. Warren Bettis, Disciplinary Counsel, and Sally Ann Steuk, for relator. Teddy Sliwinski, for respondent. Per Curiam.

We adopt the findings and recommendation of the board. Respondent is hereby indefinitely suspended from the practice of law in Ohio. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.
